site_title: Backwards Plane by Carlos Gonzalez Garcia

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 12 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. It's the Backwards Plane by Carlos Gonzalez Garcia. When it flies, it gives the illusion that it is the traditional airplane flying backwards. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 011 : Concorde By Kunihiko Kasahara", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/6ZeeZc4nCsA Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Carlos Gonzalez Garcia
block_list.body: • Backwards Plane by Carlos Gonzalez Garcia
